title: Kamisama, Oyome ni Mairimasu!
description:
The god of Inari lives in a small shrine that is in danger of being demolished and so she asks the god of marriage for a "political marriage between gods" with the thought of snarling in the straw. As a result, she decided to marry Kuro, the main god of the next Oomiwa Shrine. Inaho tries hard to get along with him, even though she doesn't know him, but Kuro just ignores Inaho...

Or so I thought, but at night I was forcibly pushed down?!
[hr][u][b]Chinese / 中文:[/b][/u]
[spoiler]寄宿在小神社里的稻荷神一族陷入了神社要被拆毁的大危机。为了和拥有神力的神明结成姻缘挽救自家神社，小狐狸稻穗拜托了大物主神「系上一段好姻缘」…
稻穗努力地想和新婚夫婿培养感情，只可惜她似乎一直被夫婿无视……。原本以为夫妻生活会破裂，但是——！？[/spoiler]

matches.title: Sakuraba-kun no 'Do Zetsurin', Dada More Nandesu...
Tensei shitara Maou-sama ni Dekiai saremashita
